```{r}

library(dplyr)
# Calculate the mean of the `mpg` column in the `mtcars` dataset

data("mtcars")
transform_data <- mtcars %>% 
  mutate(avg_mpg <- mean(mpg))
transform_data


```

```{r}
transform_data <- transform_data %>% 
  mutate(data_sqr <- hp^2)
transform_data
```
